title: Learned ball detector backend (checkpoint-driven)
scope: Integrate a learned ball detector backend capable of loading a provided checkpoint path.
Emit raw ball detection candidates with confidence and diagnostics.
Keep behavior deterministic and fail explicitly when checkpoint/deps missing.
acceptance: Ball detector backend can be enabled via CLI/config with a checkpoint path.
On a deterministic UAT clip, the pipeline emits non-zero present ball detections (best-effort).
Detector failure modes are actionable (missing checkpoint, missing runtime).

deliverables.title: Learned ball detector module
acceptance: learned_detector.py loads a checkpoint and emits candidate detections.
detector selection is configurable and deterministic.

subtasks.title: Implement checkpoint loading and candidate emission for the learned ball detector.
done_when: learned_detector.py exists with explicit backend checks.
Detector emits deterministic candidate ordering for a given frame.
